mapper.insert: insert into user1 (id, username, tel, password, wx_open_id, wx_nickname, wx_sex, wx_image, remark, status, created_at) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxSex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{wxImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user1 set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wx_open_id = #{wxOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wx_nickname = #{wxNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wx_sex = #{wxSex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, wx_image = #{wxImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, tel, password, wx_open_id, wx_nickname, wx_sex, wx_image, remark, status, created_at from user1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, username, tel, password, wx_open_id, wx_nickname, wx_sex, wx_image, remark, status, created_at from user1
